reviewText: Excellent the fist aikido dvd with the right lesson
Works great with my other martial arts skills!!
I can not get this DVD to play on my DVD player
Package labeled NTSC (via a small white sticker on label over PAL -- cannot see until remove shrink wrap). Disk is PAL so will NOT play on Region 1 device.
I learning a lot with these videos.

studying for my 3rd kyu with my son. we are taught you must learn the basics or you'll never master the advance techniques. in this dvd he explains warm-ups  ukemi how to fall  stances and basic forms. I would recommend this to anyone interested in aikido.
